title: Rainy city street with parked cars and a blue car driving in the distance.
caption: The ego vehicle is driving slowly on a rainy day, passing parked cars and a blue car in the distance.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is likely driving slowly due to the rainy conditions, which can make the road slippery and reduce visibility.
